hook: Planning a trip to Tokyo? Here's what 30 years of weather data tells us!
voiceover:
Planning a trip to Tokyo? 
Based on 30 years of NASA weather data, the best time to visit is October.
Avoid October if you don't like rain.
The hottest month is August, coldest is January.
Average temperature is around 19 degrees.
Check out 30 year weather dot com for the full 365-day forecast!
